verses.verse: Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H335>Where<s%> is the <S%H5612>bill<s%> of your <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H3748>divorcement,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have put <S%H7971>away?<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4310>which<s%> of my <S%H4480>creditors<s%> <S%H5383><s%> is it to <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H4376>sold<s%> you? <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> for your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have ye sold <S%H4376>yourselves,<s%> and for your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> is your <S%H517>mother<s%> put <S%H7971>away.<s%>

Wherefore, <S%H4069><s%> when I <S%H935>came,<s%> was there <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man?<s%> when I <S%H7121>called,<s%> was there <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H6030>answer?<s%> Is my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shortened at <S%H7114>all,<s%> <S%H7114><s%> that it cannot <S%H4480>redeem?<s%> <S%H6304><s%> <S%H518>or<s%> have I <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver?<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> at my <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> I dry <S%H2717>up<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> I <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> a <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> their <S%H1710>fish<s%> <S%H887>stinketh,<s%> because there is <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H4191>dieth<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>
I <S%H3847>clothe<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> with <S%H6940>blackness,<s%> and I <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> their <S%H3682>covering.<s%>

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H3928>learned,<s%> that I should <S%H3045>know<s%> how to speak a word in <S%H5790>season<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H853>to<s%> him that is <S%H3287>weary:<s%> he <S%H5782>wakeneth<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning,<s%> he <S%H5782>wakeneth<s%> mine <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> as the <S%H3928>learned.<s%>

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> hath <S%H6605>opened<s%> mine <S%H241>ear,<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4784>rebellious,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> turned <S%H5472>away<s%> <S%H268>back.<s%>

I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H1460>back<s%> to the <S%H5221>smiters,<s%> and my <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> to them that plucked off the <S%H4803>hair:<s%> I <S%H5641>hid<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H4480>shame<s%> <S%H3639><s%> and <S%H7536>spitting.<s%>

For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> will <S%H5826>help<s%> me; <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall I <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3637>confounded:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> like a <S%H2496>flint,<s%> and I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> I shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>

He is <S%H7138>near<s%> that <S%H6663>justifieth<s%> me; <S%H4310>who<s%> will <S%H7378>contend<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me? let us <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is mine <S%H1167>adversary?<s%> <S%H4941><s%> let him come <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me.

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> will <S%H5826>help<s%> me; <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H1931>he<s%> that shall <S%H7561>condemn<s%> me? <S%H2005>lo,<s%> they <S%H3605>all<s%> shall wax <S%H1086>old<s%> as a <S%H899>garment;<s%> the <S%H6211>moth<s%> shall eat them <S%H398>up.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is among you that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H8085>obeyeth<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in <S%H2825>darkness,<s%> and hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5051>light?<s%> let him <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H8172>stay<s%> upon his <S%H430>God.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye that <S%H6919>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire,<s%> that compass yourselves <S%H247>about<s%> with <S%H2131>sparks:<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H217>light<s%> of your <S%H784>fire,<s%> and in the <S%H2131>sparks<s%> that ye have <S%H1197>kindled.<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> shall ye <S%H1961>have<s%> of mine <S%H4480>hand;<s%> <S%H3027><s%> ye shall lie <S%H7901>down<s%> in <S%H4620>sorrow.<s%>
